questions.question_text: What are the goals of IT asset management (ITAM)? (Choose four.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABCD
Page 16 Vancouver HAMF text

Selected Answer: ABCD
As per the Training Materials the goals are 
- Improve productivity
- Financial reporting
- Cost optimization
- Decision support

Selected Answer: ABCD
Optimize cost, Provide decision support, Improve productivity, Provide financial reporting

questions.question_text: A given collection of methodologies, assets, and templates within Now Create is referred to as what?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Success Pack is the correct answer

Selected Answer: C
its success pack

Selected Answer: C
Page 25 Vancouver HAMF

Selected Answer: BCDEG
Page 29 HAMF Vancouver

Selected Answer: BCDEG
To access all available hardware asset management functionality, the plugins listed below need to be activated as they are inactive by default:
- Hardware Asset Management
- Cost Management
- Data Certification
- Managed Documents
- Procurement

Selected Answer: BCDEG
Cost Management, Procurement, Hardware Asset Management, Data Certification, Managed Documents

questions.question_text: To access the full spectrum of asset management functionality, which inactive plugins should be installed? (Choose five.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Page 22 Vancouver text

Selected Answer: C
C: Trustworthy Data, Practical Management, Operational Integration, Strategic Conformance

questions.question_text: What are the four tiers of Capability Blueprint?

choices.B: Trustworthy Data, Practical Management, Process Integration, Business Alignment
choices.D: Trustworthy Data, Lifecycle Management, Operational integration, Business Alignment
choices.A: Trustworthy Data, Lifecycle Management, Process Integration, Strategic Conformance
choices.C: Trustworthy Data, Practical Management, Operational Integration, Strategic Conformance

discussion.content: I think it's A - as comparing the two tables from a standard and HAM instance there are more fields in the HAM table that are needed for the HAM plugin

Selected Answer: C
C: no migration is needed
